course_title: Jews of Poland: History and Memory
class_notes:
(Same as JS 388 900)
Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 20- May 30, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
Topic: Memories of Jewish Eastern Europe
course_description: A 10-day trip to Warsaw and Krakow to see the sites of Jewish life and culture in Poland, and learn more about Polish Jews under Nazi occupation & Soviet domination as well as post-Soviet Jewish renewal. Includes walking tours, classes, food and cultural events, and meeting Polish univ. students.
sections: Class Nbr: 1707, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: E. Goldstein, Status: Open
